title: The Father and the Daughter - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Nobles   Royalty   Sword And Magic
author: 주월림
description:
“His Majesty, the Emperor… They say he was killed!” 

 Rumble, boom-! 

 I’m nine years old. I’m an orphan. 

 “A woman as the emperor? That’s impossible!” 

 I tried to do the emperor’s job since the seat was vacant, but what’s wrong with that idiot? 

 “Hey. Shut up and do your job.” 

 I’ll be the emperor.>
